comments:
When starting with an existing workspace, I got lots of stack traces like below,
one of each already installed bundle. This always happens with my workspace, but
does not happen with a new one.

It seems that the adaptor is being accessed before the framework install its URL
stream handler factory (see Framework.initialize), and since it tries to use
custom URLs, this is causing the MalformedURLExceptions to happen. Couldn't the
URL handler factory be installed before?

Created an attachment (id=6220)
patch for org.eclipse.osgi.framework project

Ensures the URL stream handler factory is installed before we ask the adaptor
for the installed bundles (but after the system bundle is created).
